Burton Rashad "Ringo" Smith (amụrụ na Septemba 28, 1972) bụ onye America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ hip hop na R&B
A mụrụ ya na England ma zụlite ya na Brooklyn, New York City, United States, n'ezinụlọ Jamaican na Haiti
Rashad tolitere n'akụkụ ndị omenkà hip hop ámá àmà dịka Mos Def, Busta Rhymes, Q-Tip, na ndị ọzọ.
Mgbè ọ dị afọ 19, o nyere Main Source, Eric B na Rakim na A Tribe Called Quest

Ọ gara n'ihu n'ime azụmahịa egwu site n'iso Andre Harrell rụọ ọrụ na Uptown Records nke e mepụtara ọhụrụ. Mgbè ọ nọ na Uptown, Rashad zutere ónyé na-akpọ ụbọ akwara Avon Marshell onye ya na ya guzobere Tumblin Dice
Duo ahụ gara n'ihu na-emepụta maka ndị na-ese ihe kachasị na Uptown, gụnyere Mary J
Tumblin Dice ga-aga n'ihu ịghọ ndị na-emepụta ihe maka Bad Boy Records nke e guzobere na nso nso a, mgbe Sean "Puffy" Combs rịọrọ Rashad ka ọ sonye na ndị otu mmepụta ya The Hitmen
N'oge a, Rashad mepụtara ihe ndị dị n'elu chaatị
Rashad gàrà n'ihu na chaatị ya na-aga n'ihu mgbe o dechara Busta Rhymes nke mbụ, "Woo Hah!! Ọ Na-enyocha Gị Nile"
Rashad edeela egwu maka Aaliyah, Fat Joe, MC Lyte, Lil 'Kim, Foxy Brown, Das EFX, Slick Rick, En Vogue, 50 Cent, Erykah Badu, Nicki Minaj, na DJ Khaled na ndị ọzọ.
